dot._comment: Damage over Time - degats physiques ou magiques selon le sort source

burn.description_fr: Inflige des degats magiques par seconde. Se stack jusqu'a 3. Duree peut etre prolongee/reduite.
burn.description_en: Deals magical damage per second. Stacks up to 3. Duration can be extended/reduced.

poison.formula: 2% max HP per tick per stack
poison.description_fr: Inflige des degats bases sur les HP max. Se stack jusqu'a 5. Ignore armure/resist.
poison.description_en: Deals max HP-based damage per second. Stacks up to 5. Ignores armor/resist.

bleed.description_fr: Inflige des degats physiques par seconde. Se stack jusqu'a 3. Reduit par armure.
bleed.description_en: Deals physical damage per second. Stacks up to 3. Reduced by armor.

curse_dot.formula: MAG * 0.2 per tick, EXPLOSION at end = total_damage * 0.5
curse_dot.description_fr: Degats constants + EXPLOSION a la fin. Duree prolongee = explosion plus forte. Duree reduite = explosion anticipee + SPREAD aux ennemis adjacents.
curse_dot.description_en: Constant damage + EXPLOSION at end. Extended duration = stronger explosion. Reduced duration = early explosion + SPREAD to adjacent enemies.
curse_dot.lore: Corruption de l'Imitateur qui s'accumule et eclate

holy_dot.formula: tick_1: MAG * 0.1, tick_2: MAG * 0.15, tick_3: MAG * 0.2, ... (croissant)
holy_dot.description_fr: Degats CROISSANTS par tick. Duree FIXE, ne peut pas etre prolongee ou reduite. Inexorable.
holy_dot.description_en: ESCALATING damage per tick. FIXED duration, cannot be extended or reduced. Inexorable.
holy_dot.lore: Lumiere purificatrice du Createur, brule de plus en plus fort

hot._comment: Heal over Time - soins appliques par sorts

heal_over_time.description_fr: Soigne X HP par seconde. Se stack jusqu'a 3. Applique par sorts de Healer.
heal_over_time.description_en: Heals X HP per second. Stacks up to 3. Applied by Healer spells.

armor_up.description_fr: Augmente la reduction des degats physiques

armor_down.description_fr: Reduit la reduction des degats physiques

magic_resist_up.description_fr: Augmente la reduction des degats magiques

magic_resist_down.description_fr: Reduit la reduction des degats magiques

tempo._comment: Attack speed modifiers - GCD reste fixe a 2s

atk_speed_up.description_fr: Augmente la frequence des auto-attacks. GCD reste fixe a 2s. Pour physical DPS.
atk_speed_up.description_en: Increases auto-attack frequency. GCD stays fixed at 2s. For physical DPS.

atk_speed_down.description_fr: Reduit la frequence des auto-attacks. GCD reste fixe a 2s. Counter physical DPS.
atk_speed_down.description_en: Reduces auto-attack frequency. GCD stays fixed at 2s. Counters physical DPS.

cast_speed_up.description_fr: Reduit le temps d'incantation des sorts. Pour casters. Ne reduit pas le GCD.
cast_speed_up.description_en: Reduces spell cast time. For casters. Doesn't reduce GCD.

cast_speed_down.description_fr: Augmente le temps d'incantation des sorts. Counter casters. Interrompt le rythme.
cast_speed_down.description_en: Increases spell cast time. Counters casters. Disrupts rhythm.

stun.description_fr: Impossible d'agir (auto, skills, move, items). CC le plus fort.
stun.description_en: Cannot act (auto, skills, move, items). Strongest CC.

silence.description_fr: Impossible de lancer des sorts/skills. Peut auto-attack, bouger, utiliser items. Counter casters.
silence.description_en: Cannot cast spells/skills. Can auto-attack, move, use items. Counters casters.

disarm.description_fr: Impossible d'utiliser auto-attack. Peut lancer skills, bouger, utiliser items. Counter physical DPS.
disarm.description_en: Cannot use auto-attack. Can cast skills, move, use items. Counters physical DPS.

root.description_fr: Impossible de se deplacer ou utiliser skills de dash. Peut auto-attack et lancer skills.
root.description_en: Cannot move or use dash skills. Can auto-attack and cast skills.

fear.description_fr: Mouvement aleatoire incontrole + impossible d'agir. CC de disruption.
fear.description_en: Random uncontrolled movement + cannot act. Disruption CC.

confusion.description_fr: Peut attaquer ses allies au lieu des ennemis. Peut agir normalement sinon. CC PvP chaos.
confusion.description_en: May attack allies instead of enemies. Can act normally otherwise. PvP chaos CC.

blind.description_fr: Precision reduite a 25%. 75% chance de miss sur chaque attaque. Soft CC, n'empeche pas d'agir.
blind.description_en: Accuracy reduced to 25%. 75% chance to miss each attack. Soft CC, doesn't prevent actions.

shield.description_fr: Absorbe des degats jusqu'a epuisement. Valeur definie par le sort. Plusieurs shields ne se cumulent pas, le plus fort prime.
shield.description_en: Absorbs damage until depleted. Value set by spell. Multiple shields don't stack, strongest applies.

evasion.description_fr: Esquive garantie de TOUTES les attaques physiques et magiques. Duree courte (2-5s). Ne bloque pas les AOE zone.
evasion.description_en: Guaranteed dodge of ALL physical and magical attacks. Short duration (2-5s). Does not block zone AOE.

block.description_fr: Annule completement la prochaine attaque recue (phys ou mag). Consomme 1 charge.
block.description_en: Completely negates the next attack received (phys or mag). Consumes 1 charge.

parry.description_fr: Bloque la prochaine attaque melee ET riposte automatiquement. Counter = 50% ATK.
parry.description_en: Blocks next melee attack AND auto-counters. Counter = 50% ATK.

reflect.description_fr: Renvoie un % des degats recus a l'attaquant. % defini par le sort (20-50% typique).
reflect.description_en: Returns % of damage taken to attacker. % set by spell (20-50% typical).

thorns.formula: DEF * 0.1 per stack to melee attackers
thorns.description_fr: Inflige des degats fixes aux attaquants melee. Se stack. Passif, ne consomme pas l'effet.
thorns.description_en: Deals flat damage to melee attackers. Stacks. Passive, doesn't consume effect.

sacrifice.description_fr: Lie a un allie. Recoit un % de ses degats a sa place. Lien visible. Tank/Guardian skill.
sacrifice.description_en: Links to an ally. Takes % of their damage instead. Link visible. Tank/Guardian skill.

cover.formula: intercepts next single-target attack on ally
cover.description_fr: Se place devant un allie. Intercepte la prochaine attaque single-target le ciblant. 1 charge.
cover.description_en: Steps in front of ally. Intercepts next single-target attack targeting them. 1 charge.

immunity._comment: Immunites - buffs puissants avec CD long

invulnerable.description_fr: Immune a TOUS les degats (physiques, magiques, DoT, AOE). Peut toujours agir. Duree tres courte (2-4s). CD tres long.
invulnerable.description_en: Immune to ALL damage (physical, magical, DoT, AOE). Can still act. Very short duration (2-4s). Very long CD.

untargetable.description_fr: Ne peut pas etre cible par single-target. Subit les AOE zone. Position VISIBLE sur la map. Peut agir.
untargetable.description_en: Cannot be targeted by single-target. Takes zone AOE. Position VISIBLE on map. Can act.

invisible.description_fr: Position INCONNUE de l'ennemi. Peut se repositionner. Subit AOE si dedans. Brise si action offensive. Rogue skill.
invisible.description_en: Position UNKNOWN to enemy. Can reposition. Takes AOE if inside. Breaks on offensive action. Rogue skill.

cc_immune.description_fr: Immune a stun, silence, root, fear, confusion, blind, disarm. Recoit toujours les degats. Buff personnel.
cc_immune.description_en: Immune to stun, silence, root, fear, confusion, blind, disarm. Still takes damage. Personal buff.

cc_immune_zone.description_fr: Cree une zone. Allies dans la zone immuns aux CC. Zone fixe, ne bouge pas. Healer/Support skill.
cc_immune_zone.description_en: Creates a zone. Allies inside immune to CC. Zone is fixed, doesn't move. Healer/Support skill.

aggro_up.description_fr: Toutes les actions generent +10% menace par stack. Pour tanks. Les monstres attaquent qui a le plus de menace.
aggro_up.description_en: All actions generate +10% threat per stack. For tanks. Monsters attack whoever has most threat.

aggro_down.description_fr: Toutes les actions generent -10% menace par stack. Pour DPS/Healers. Evite d'attirer l'aggro.
aggro_down.description_en: All actions generate -10% threat per stack. For DPS/Healers. Avoids drawing aggro.

taunt.description_fr: La cible DOIT attaquer le lanceur pendant la duree. Ignore la menace normale. Skill de tank essentiel.
taunt.description_en: Target MUST attack caster for duration. Ignores normal threat. Essential tank skill.

marked.description_fr: La cible est marquee. Le marqueur inflige +X% degats a la cible. Visible sur l'interface. Focus target pour DPS.
marked.description_en: Target is marked. Marker deals +X% damage to target. Visible on UI. Focus target for DPS.

revealed.description_fr: Empeche d'utiliser invisible ou untargetable. Retire ces effets si actifs. Counter Rogue/stealth builds.
revealed.description_en: Prevents using invisible or untargetable. Removes these effects if active. Counters Rogue/stealth builds.

vulnerable.description_fr: Recoit +10% degats de TOUTES sources par stack. Se cumule avec marked. Debuff generique puissant.
vulnerable.description_en: Takes +10% damage from ALL sources per stack. Stacks with marked. Powerful generic debuff.

berserk.formula: +10% damage dealt AND +10% damage taken per stack
berserk.description_fr: Augmente degats infliges ET recus. Risque/recompense. Pour builds offensifs. Warrior berserker.
berserk.description_en: Increases damage dealt AND taken. Risk/reward. For offensive builds. Warrior berserker.

amplify.formula: +10% next spell/skill power per stack, consumed on use
amplify.description_fr: Prochain sort/skill +10% puissance par stack. CONSOMME a l'utilisation. Setup pour burst.
amplify.description_en: Next spell/skill +10% power per stack. CONSUMED on use. Setup for burst.

regen.description_fr: Regenere 1% HP max par seconde par stack. Passif, hors combat principalement. Buff de sustain.
regen.description_en: Regenerates 1% max HP per second per stack. Passive, mainly out of combat. Sustain buff.

mana_regen.description_fr: Regenere 2% MP max par seconde par stack. Pour casters. Plus agressif que HP regen.
mana_regen.description_en: Regenerates 2% max MP per second per stack. For casters. More aggressive than HP regen.

mana_drain.description_fr: Perd 3% MP max par seconde par stack. Counter casters. Rare et puissant.
mana_drain.description_en: Loses 3% max MP per second per stack. Counters casters. Rare and powerful.

mana_lock.description_fr: Impossible de regenerer mana (naturelle ou par effets). Peut toujours utiliser le mana restant. Counter sustain casters.
mana_lock.description_en: Cannot regenerate mana (natural or from effects). Can still use remaining mana. Counters sustain casters.

lifesteal.formula: heals [skill_value]% of damage dealt per stack
lifesteal.description_fr: Soigne un % des degats physiques infliges par stack. S'applique aux auto-attacks et skills physiques.
lifesteal.description_en: Heals % of physical damage dealt per stack. Applies to auto-attacks and physical skills.

heal_block.description_fr: Bloque 100% des soins recus. Duree courte (2-4s). Tres rare. PvP clutch pour finir une cible.
heal_block.description_en: Blocks 100% of healing received. Short duration (2-4s). Very rare. PvP clutch to finish a target.

heal_reduction.description_fr: -50% soins recus par stack. Cap a 95% (5% soins minimum). Counter healers et lifesteal builds.
heal_reduction.description_en: -50% healing received per stack. Capped at 95% (5% healing minimum). Counters healers and lifesteal builds.

shield_block.description_fr: Empeche de recevoir de NOUVEAUX boucliers. N'affecte pas shields existants. Counter Guardian/shield spam.
shield_block.description_en: Prevents receiving NEW shields. Doesn't affect existing shields. Counters Guardian/shield spam.
